trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Marietta
There were no other sightings in Marietta on or around March 4th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsThis sighting was about 45 degrees of the horizon , 10 degrees SSE. Object moved very erratically in triangular flight paths. Rapid short bursts of movement at extremely sharp angles of change of direction indicated this was to me a possible UFO. Odd thing was that ten to fifteen antenna gradually migrated out of the main body of the vehicle. Object had the appearance of a spider when antenna were fully extended. Antennae were about 5 times longer than the main vehicle. Antennae gradually withdrew and vehicle vaporized away.
Summary: star like object , spider like appendages migrating gradually out of the main body vehicle.
